pkgmetadata.longdescription: compiz like eye-candy 3D wayland, with low memory footprint. Aims to bring desktop features such as 3D cube, fire burn, fisheye, wrot and all other desktop effects to wayland.

use.flag: use libglvnd to do animations more efficiently
Use the system-wide gui-libs/wf-config instead of building as a submodule. It will block system-wide gui-libs/wf-config from being installed.
Use the system-wide gui-libs/wlroots instead of building as a submodule. It will block system-wide gui-libs/wlroots from being installed.
